metadata.synopsis: Two students (Rani Mukherjee, Vivek Oberoi) meet at a wedding and fall in love, but they marry in secret due to their class differences.

reviews: What drives this love story are impressive performances by Rani Mukerji and Vivek Oberoi.

Duets and full scale wedding routines follow each other as the first half zips along with its charter to set the musical mood. In cinemas, Saathiya will be played with an interval in keeping with Indian cinema rituals, when patrons can discuss the songs,
